001package io.github.ai4ci.abm;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007/**
008 * A contact between two people.
009 *
010 * A contact is always associated with a {@link PersonHistory} which tells you
011 * when it happened. There are a lot of contacts recorded so this is optimised
012 * for small storage. and contains the bare minimum. Participants in the contact
013 * are resolved by id.
014 *
015 * @see Exposure
016 */
017@Value.Immutable
018public interface Contact extends Serializable {
019
020        /**
021         * Get the other participant in a contact
022         *
023         * @param id the person id of one participant in the contact
024         * @return the person id of the other participant in the contact
025         */
026        default int getParticipant(int id) {
027                if (id == this.getParticipant1Id()) { return this.getParticipant2Id(); }
028                if (id == this.getParticipant2Id()) { return this.getParticipant1Id(); }
029                throw new RuntimeException("Not a participant");
030        }
031
032        /**
033         * Get the most recent history of the other participant in a contact
034         *
035         * @param one the history of one participant in the contact, used to resolve
036         *            the other participant and the time of the contact
037         * @return the most recent history of the other participant in the contact,
038         *         as of the time of the contact
039         */
040        default PersonHistory getParticipant(PersonHistory one) {
041                var id = this.getParticipant(one.getEntity().getId());
042                int time = one.getTime();
043                return one.getEntity().getOutbreak().getPersonHistoryByIdAndTime(id, time)
044                                .get();
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Get the most recent history of the other participant in a contact
049         *
050         * @param one the state of one participant in the contact, used to resolve
051         *            the other participant and the time of the contact
052         * @return the most recent history of the other participant in the contact,
053         *         as of the time of the contact. Note that this is not necessarily
054         *         the same as the current history of the other participant, since
055         *         the contact may have occurred in the past. The current history is
056         *         returned if the contact occurred at the current time step.
057         *
058         */
059        default PersonHistory getParticipant(PersonState one) {
060                var id = this.getParticipant(one.getEntity().getId());
061                return one.getEntity().getOutbreak().getPersonById(id)
062                                .flatMap(p -> p.getCurrentHistory()).get();
063        }
064
065//      /**
066//       * The strength of the contact is at the moment defined as the probability
067//       * of the contact occurring.
068//       */
069//      double getProximityDuration();
070
071        /**
072         * Get the unique identifier of the first participant in the contact.
073         *
074         * @return the person id of the first participant; corresponds to the
075         *         {@code id} field of the source person record
076         */
077        int getParticipant1Id();
078
079        /**
080         * Get the unique identifier of the second participant in the contact.
081         *
082         * @return the person id of the second participant; corresponds to the
083         *         {@code id} field of the contacted person record
084         */
085        int getParticipant2Id();
086
087        /**
088         * Get the current state of the other participant in a contact
089         *
090         * @param one the state of one participant in the contact, used to resolve
091         *            the other participant and the time of the contact
092         * @return the current state of the other participant in the contact. Note
093         *         that this is not necessarily the same as the state of the other
094         *         participant at the time of the contact, since the contact may have
095         *         occurred in the past. The state at the time of the contact is
096         *         returned if the contact occurred at the current time step.
097         *
098         */
099        default PersonState getParticipantState(PersonTemporalState one) {
100                var id = this.getParticipant(one.getEntity().getId());
101                return one.getEntity().getOutbreak().getPersonById(id)
102                                .map(p -> p.getCurrentState()).get();
103        }
104
105        /**
106         * Whether the contact was detected by a smart agent. This is used to
107         * determine whether the contact should be included in contact tracing
108         * analyses and whether it should be included in contact network statistics.
109         * The contact may have been detected by a smart agent if either participant
110         * is a smart agent and the contact was detected by that agent. Note that a
111         * contact may be detected by one agent but not the other, so this is not
112         * necessarily symmetric.
113         *
114         * @return Was a contact detected by a smart agent
115         */
116        boolean isDetected();
117
118}
